title: Sleepy Daniel
description: Biography site of Daniel Zalmen Jackson. The site aims to accurately portray Daniel's early days with the help of visual and audio aids
myRole: This is the first website I ever built. It contains pure HTML, CSS and a tiny bit of XML. Making it responsive or cross-browser compatible were not even options in the scope of possibilities at this point, but I was very excited to make my first web animations. Overall, an exciting project for its time.
